attributes.positionDescription:
- Developed and planned websites and web applications, ensuring a seamless user experience across multiple devices.
- Optimized performance, quality, and maintenance of existing projects, with the goal of improving website loading speed by 30%.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement modern design standards, contributing to a 20% reduction in bounce rates on key client projects.
- Front-end development for client projects, focusing on building scalable, maintainable codebases that adhere to the latest accessibility and web standards.
- Created email templates for marketing campaigns, aiming to increase email open rates by 15% through more engaging and responsive designs.

- Implemented page layouts and web designs for new sites. 
- Updated content and design of existing websites. 
- Developed email templates and generated reports for email marketing campaigns.
- Developed email and landing page templates for marketing campaigns aimed at customer acquisition.
